product_name: LOOPSWeekly Reset Rejuvenating Eye Mask 5 Piece Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeWeekly Reset Rejuvenating Eye Mask 5 Piece Set by Loops. Quickly alleviate the look of lackluster, puffy skin. Under Eye Mask hydrates, brightens and helps reduce wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightening, hydrating, nourishing, helps reduce appearance of wrinkles in just 10 minutesCan be used as needed, or as part of your weekly face care routineEach set includes 5 face masksHydrogel mask material is eco-friendlyWon't clog poresFor all skin typesDermatologist testedFormulated without: Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates, Synthetic Fragrances, Drying Alcohol, Mineral Oil.FeaturesInnovative hydrogel technology allows the mask to adhere to your skin, while simultaneously helping Loops ingredients absorb more effectivelyLOOPS masks won't slip or drip, because your face care routine shouldn't have to slow you downLike a multi-vitamin for your eye area, these masks help to quickly alleviate the look of lackluster, puffy skinKey IngredientsNiacinamide - smooths fine lines and wrinkles by strengthening the skinRetinol 50C - increases cell turnover for smoother skin and natural collagen productionPearl Extract - instantly boosts luminosity and moistureGeranium Flower - soothes and tones the skinItem 2590394How To UseThe Moment It's For: Whenever the area under your eyes isn't as bright or perky as usual. Use for 10 minutes, 2-3 times a week for best results.Start by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open, pull out tray, and remove film from mask.Apply the textured side of each mask under your eyes.Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Incorporate LOOPS into your regular face care routine for best results.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Polyglycerin-3, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Panthenol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pearl Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polysorbate 20, Retinol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Impatiens Balsamina Flower Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: The Moment It's For: Whenever the area under your eyes isn't as bright or perky as usual. Use for 10 minutes, 2-3 times a week for best results.Start by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open, pull out tray, and remove film from mask.Apply the textured side of each mask under your eyes.Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Incorporate LOOPS into your regular face care routine for best results.

reviews.headline: Itchy
reviews.comments: I want to like these bc they do feel like theyre very hydrating, but everytime i try them i immediatrly get itchy arohnd my eyes. I dont frel this with any other masks.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I used this one time and it noticeably made my eyes more puffy looking.  That didnt last too long but then It also gave me a bad rash on my face hours later.  I wish it let me post a photo of the rash !

reviews.headline: Great refresher
reviews.comments: I use these on some n days after I do a peeling solution for on "The Ordinary". It's like starting the week off right for my skin.

reviews.headline: Contact dermatitis
reviews.comments: These eye patches caused contact dermatitis, wih significant swelling and discomfort, requiring medical treatment. I typically do not have sensitive skin or allergies. This is the first time I experience such an adverse reaction to a product.

reviews.headline: Not sure
reviews.comments: The first time I tried these they were ok. However I did notice a burning sensation, I thought maybe I left it too long. After trying it 2 more times, it's the same feeling instantly.  They burn every time. Do not like it.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I do not have sensitive skin at all, so when something causes me itching and irritation, it means that it will be extra harsh on those with more sensitive skin. I don't know if it's the texture of the mask or the product, but every single time I used my eye patches my under eyes would get extremely itchy, tight, burning, and uncomfortable. I also got under eye Region acne and milia under my eyes from using this. I would not recommend this. I think I am allergic to something in the ingredients. I never had problems with Loops products before but now I am allergic. Perhaps it is a change in formula.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Eye masks usually make my skin burn but this one is perfect. Super comfortable and feels amazing!!

reviews.headline: üëèüèΩ
reviews.comments: I usually don't use products like this or eye creams but I was happy about this and glad I used the morning from not sleeping well that night.

reviews.headline: Love them
reviews.comments: Love this loops mask. Makes my clean feel refreshed. I'm confused by the reviews saying these are scratchy or the person who couldn't figure out how to apply‚Ä¶ they are very easy to use!!

reviews.headline: So amazing
reviews.comments: Just bought these and tried them last night they're really refreshing and made my under eyes feel hydrated

reviews.headline: So amazing
reviews.comments: Just bought these and tried them last night they're really refreshing and made my under eyes feel hydrated

reviews.headline: Wow‚Ä¶.. just wow!!!!
reviews.comments: I have never used a mask because I was nervous I would breakout or it would make my skin uncomfortable. I tried this and my skin was INSTANTLY amazing!!! It did exactly what it said it could do ü•∞ I woke up and it feels wonderful!!! I'm hooked!!! ü•∞

reviews.headline: The burn!
reviews.comments: I did not enjoy this. Bought it to just give it a try and it was a let down. It felt super prickly when I put them on. I couldn't keep them on for more than 3 mins because it felt like spikes on my skin. Very itchy.

reviews.headline: Too scratchy
reviews.comments: These were sold out when I tried to buy them the first time and I should have just gave up then. Cute packaging but these are terrible. Very scratchy on the side you put on your under eye. It made my eye water. Also they are awkwardly shaped and couldn't figure out a great place to put them. Will definitely keep purchasing Patchology or even the more expensive Peter Thomas Roth under eye patches.

reviews.headline: Love these
reviews.comments: Love these very similar to my ptr ones but cheaper !

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: Finally these are at ulta! Love this mask for my once a week pick me up face mask !!

reviews.headline: So refreshing!!!!
reviews.comments: They are so amazing and refreshing. I have major under eye dark circles and these brighten them. I would recommend highly and you can use them at least 3x.

reviews.headline: finally!
reviews.comments: I LOVE these masks and am so excited they're finally at Ulta! They feel so luxurious and leave my skin feeling amazing. They're also much more user friendly than regular sheet masks since they really stay put.

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought the Variety Loop pack and I love every mask in it (my personal favourite is the Weekly Reset). Not only do the masks have incredible results with my skin- but the experience of using them and incorporating them into my beauty routine has given me so much more confidence and a fresh new perspective on self-care and love for my skin. The masks are calming, refreshing, nourishing, comforting- basically all of the things I would want in a mask and then some. Thank you Loops for being the star of my new beloved beauty routine! Shipping was longer than expected (3 weeks)
faceoff_positive.headline: I bought the Variety Loop

faceoff_negative.comments: I do not have sensitive skin at all, so when something causes me itching and irritation, it means that it will be extra harsh on those with more sensitive skin. I don't know if it's the texture of the mask or the product, but every single time I used my eye patches my under eyes would get extremely itchy, tight, burning, and uncomfortable. I also got under eye Region acne and milia under my eyes from using this. I would not recommend this. I think I am allergic to something in the ingredients. I never had problems with Loops products before but now I am allergic. Perhaps it is a change in formula.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for sensitive skin

rollup.name: Weekly Reset Rejuvenating Eye Mask 5 Piece Set
